lead_paragraph: Belgian debutant Stoffel Vandoorne handed McLaren their first point of the Formula One season in Bahrain on Sunday while the team's two champion drivers looked on from the sidelines.

headline.print_headline: Vandoorne Proves a Point on His Formula One Debut
headline.main: Vandoorne Proves a Point on His Formula One Debut

snippet: Belgian debutant Stoffel Vandoorne handed McLaren their first point of the Formula One season in Bahrain on Sunday while the team's two champion drivers looked on from the sidelines....
